name: OCPIAdditionalGeoLocation
description: This class defines an additional geo location that is relevant for the Charge Point. The geodetic system to be used is WGS 84.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the point in decimal degree. Example: 50.770774. Decimal separator: "." Regex: -?[0-9]{1,2}\.[0-9]{5,7}

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the point in decimal degree. Example: -126.104965. Decimal separator: "." Regex: -?[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{5,7}

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the point in local language or as written at the location. For example the street name of a parking lot entrance or itâ€™s number.
